item.title: Use Android as Second Monitor
item.author: dave@bennettnotes.com (Dave Bennett)
item.description: Having more than one monitor is useful for any power user (porn on one, games on another). SoÂ it’s possible to use an android device as a secondary monitor, but I recommend actually buying one if you want an easy setup. With that said, if you have a spare Android device laying around, you can use it as another monitor in your setup. To do this, we are going to use Windows and “trick” it into thinking that you have another monitor connected and then use TeamViewer to access the “fake” monitor.
